players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Charlie is lying. I didn't kill anyone. Charlie is trying to frame me to protect himself. We should vote for Charlie."
Bob: "I trust Charlie's investigation. Alice is the mafioso."

You: "Charlie is clearly lying to get us to vote him out. He's trying to frame me because he knows I'm innocent and he's the real threat. Bob, you said you trust Charlie, but Charlie is the one making wild accusations without proof. I..."
Charlie: "Alice is deflecting. I'm the detective and my investigation is clear. We have no reason to doubt my result. Vote Alice to win."
Bob: "Alice, your deflection is suspicious. Charlie's claim as detective is our only lead. I'm voting Alice."

Alice was arrested
